code: import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import cartReducer from'./Reducer';import itemSaga from'./Saga';import createSagaMiddleware from'@redux-saga/core';var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var store=configureStore({reducer:{cartReducer:cartReducer},middleware:function middleware(){return[sagaMiddleware];}});sagaMiddleware.run(itemSaga);export default store;
